author: christopheralanwest
body:
#### PR description:

This PR updates offline, prompt-like and 2021 MC global tags in 10_6_X.

**Run I and Run II data**

Update of PPS conditions [1], HCAL response corrections [2], pixel/tracker conditions [3] for 2017 UL reprocessing.

Diffs:
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/106X_dataRun2_v11/106X_dataRun2_v10
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/106X_dataRun2_relval_v10/106X_dataRun2_relval_v9

[1] https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/4136.html
[2] https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/4132/1.html
[3] https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/4117/1.html

**Prompt-like Data**

Update of PPS conditions [1].

[1] https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/4136.html

Diffs:
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/106X_dataRun2_PromptLike_v7/106X_dataRun2_PromptLike_v6
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/106X_dataRun2_PromptLike_HI_v7/106X_dataRun2_PromptLike_HI_v6
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/106X_dataRun2_PromptLike_HEfail_v6/106X_dataRun2_PromptLike_HEfail_v5

**2021 MC**

2021 MC is based on the best 2018 conditions available (106X_upgrade2018_realistic_v4), but with several other changes:

- Modified HCAL tags to incorporate updated geometry, including updated energy scale for upgraded HB
- Updated beam spot (round optics, high sigmaZ)
- Ideal CSC and pixel conditions

[1] 

Diffs:
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/106X_upgrade2021_design_v1/106X_postLS2_design_v4
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/106X_upgrade2021_realistic_v4/106X_postLS2_realistic_v4
https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/106X_upgrade2021cosmics_realistic_deco_v2/106X_upgrade2021cosmics_realistic_deco_v1


#### PR validation:

Please see the links inline above for details of the validation. In addition, this PR includes a GT update that should resolve https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/24795#issuecomment-490533983.

A dedicated [RelVal campaign for the 2021 realistic MC GT](https://cms-pdmv.cern.ch/valdb/?selected=10_6_0_pre4_2021&Reconstruction=true&RFull=true&PAGs=true&PFull=true) is underway.

Matrix tests have also been performed:
```
runTheMatrix.py -l limited -i all --ibeos
```
title: Update 106X global tags in data and 2021 MC
